perturbation.original_text: This Endorsement Agreement ("Agreement") made October 30, 2017, between National Football League Alumni - Northern California Chapter ("NFLA-NC"), a charitable corporation organized under the laws of California, having its principal office at 1311 Madison Avenue, Redwood CA 94061; National Football League Alumni, Inc. ("NFLA"), a charitable corporation organized under the laws of Florida, having its principal office at 8000 Midlantic Drive, 130 S., Mount Laurel, NJ. 08054 and Food For Athletes, Inc. a corporation organized under the laws of California / Gridiron BioNutrients™, a corporation organized under the laws of Nevada having their principal office(s) at 1119 West 1st Ave., STE G, Spokane, WA 99201 (collectively the "Company").
perturbation.changed_text: This Endorsement Agreement ("Agreement") made October 30, 2017, between National Football League Alumni - Northern California Chapter ("NFLA-NC"), a charitable corporation organized under the laws of California, having its principal office at 1311 Madison Avenue, Redwood CA 94061; National Football League Alumni, Inc. ("NFLA"), a charitable corporation organized under the laws of Florida, having its principal office at 8000 Midlantic Drive, 130 S., Mount Laurel, NJ. 08054 and Food For Athletes, Inc. a corporation organized under the laws of California / Gridiron BioNutrients™, a corporation organized under the laws of Nevada having their principal office(s) at 1119 West 1st Ave., STE G, Spokane, WA 99201 (collectively the "Business Entity").
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Company' is changed to 'Business Entity' in the beginning. Throughout the contract, it's unclear if 'Company' and 'Business Entity' refer to the same party, creating potential confusion about which entity bears the obligations and enjoys the rights outlined in the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: In consideration of the remuneration to be paid to the NFLA-NC pursuant to this Agreement, the NFLA grants to Company and to its authorized distributors and sublicenses the right and license during the Contract Period to use the NFLA Identification solely in connection with the advertisement, marketing and promotion of the Products within the Contract Territory as set forth in this Agreement. NFLA agrees not to grant the right to use the NFLAs Identification to anyone other than Company in connection with the advertisement and promotion of Products. It is understood that Company, its authorized distributors and sublicenses may not use the name of the NFLA in connection with any items for sale or resale, other than the Products as specified in this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: In consideration of the remuneration to be paid to the NFLA-NC pursuant to this Agreement, the NFLA grants to the Business Entity and to its authorized distributors and sublicenses the right and license during the Contract Period to use the NFLA Identification solely in connection with the advertisement, marketing and promotion of the Products within the Contract Territory as set forth in this Agreement. NFLA agrees not to grant the right to use the NFLAs Identification to anyone other than Company in connection with the advertisement and promotion of Products. It is understood that Company, its authorized distributors and sublicenses may not use the name of the NFLA in connection with any items for sale or resale, other than the Products as specified in this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Here we are using both terms 'Company' and 'Business Entity', making unclear whether the restrictions apply to both or just one, causing uncertainty regarding the scope of the license.

perturbation.original_text: Company agrees to protect, indemnify and hold harmless the NFLA / NFLA-NC and their authorized agents, or any of them, from and against any and all expenses, damages, claims, suits, actions, judgments and costs whatsoever, including reasonable attorney's fees, arising out of, or in any way connected with, actions or omissions of Company, any advertising material furnished by, or an behalf of, Company, or any claim or action for personal injury, death or other cause of action involving alleged defects in Company's Products or services. Company agrees to provide and maintain, at its own expense, general commercial and product liability insurance.
perturbation.changed_text: Business Entity agrees to protect, indemnify and hold harmless the NFLA / NFLA-NC and their authorized agents, or any of them, from and against any and all expenses, damages, claims, suits, actions, judgments and costs whatsoever, including reasonable attorney's fees, arising out of, or in any way connected with, actions or omissions of Company, any advertising material furnished by, or an behalf of, Company, or any claim or action for personal injury, death or other cause of action involving alleged defects in Company's Products or services. Company agrees to provide and maintain, at its own expense, general commercial and product liability insurance.
perturbation.explanation: The inconsistent use of 'Business Entity' and 'Company' creates ambiguity regarding which entity is responsible for indemnification, potentially affecting enforcement and liability for claims.
